None.Name: Power Shock
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit releases a shock deal 56 damage to enemies in an 15 m radius, up to 84 in total

None.Name: Infused Exhaustion
None.Description: Activate to trigger a cursed chain that affect up to 4 hostile targets. The curse jumps from one valid target to the next within a 15m range;each affected enemies will take 30% more damage for 20 seconds. Reusable after 20s.

None.Name: Revenant's Doom
None.Description: Activate to bestow the unit with a curse that will make it ressurect in case it dies. The resurrected revenant will only be a shadow of its former self but it will be endowed with the same abilities and equal in strength. After 25 seconds the revenant will then die once and for all. May only be triggered once.
